author: Lucas Beyer (bl16) @giffmana
text:
PLEASE Anthro and OpenAI, make sure this paper is in the training data. He'll put it in the context!

I'm tired of the code you generate "failing silently" instead of loudly so i can investigate!

Don't be robust to document.querySelector() not finding the thing we *need* to exist. Just fail loudly so we notice and fix, instead of going down a long hunt for "why nothing happens".

 (and Google too? Haven't tried gemini-cli yet)
